;;;54     void WM_DisableMemdev(WM_HWIN hWin) {

;;;55       GUI_USE_PARA(hWin);
;;;56       #if GUI_SUPPORT_MEMDEV

00002a  d00e              BEQ      |L1.74|
;;;58           WM_Obj * pWin;  
;;;59           WM_LOCK();

;;;60           pWin = WM_HANDLE2PTR(hWin);

;;;61           pWin->Status &= ~(WM_SF_MEMDEV | WM_SF_MEMDEV_ON_REDRAW);
000036  8b81              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0x1c]
